about_the_game:
You’ve just escaped a swarm of angry, bloodthirsty chickens. The thin walls of a lone camper trailer in the desert are all that separates you from your demise.
In front of you lies a flashlight, a floppy disk, and a hamster. Clock’s ticking, hurry up! Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?

WELCOME TO THE CRAZY WORLD OF HOLY CHICK!


  • Short and lighthearted Escape Room game, ideal for newcomers to Virtual Reality
  • Puzzles and traps taking full advantage of VR
  • Bloodthirsty chickens and self-destruction mechanisms keeping you on your toes
  • Hamster-based mechanics
  • Player feedback helps shape the final version of the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or greater (only Oculus Rift, for Vive see Recomended spec)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or greater (only Oculus Rift, for Vive see Recomended spec)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or greater
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: In a world where bloodthirsty chickens have taken over the planet, it’s hard to keep your cool. You find shelter in a suspicious camper trailer, but angry beaks are pecking at the windows outside. Time is running out. Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?
